rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the garden for natural light and ventilation. Mediterranean style finishes.
Adjacent to the living room, with an open-plan layout that integrates seamlessly with the kitchen area.
Fully equipped Mediterranean kitchen with modern amenities and ample storage.
Spacious master bedroom featuring large windows for natural light, aligned in the north-east direction per Vastu guidelines.
Cozy guest/children's room located in a quiet area of the floor plan.
Dedicated home theater space with acoustics designed for optimal sound experience. Located near the living room for easy access, but sufficiently isolated to avoid disturbances.

openings.description: Main entrance door with a Mediterranean arch design.
Large window providing view of the garden and natural light.
Floor-to-ceiling window aligned with the west-facing plot for evening views.
Secondary exit leading to the garden and service area.
